text: Ye Olden Days is a 1933 animated short film. It was released as part of the Mickey Mouse film series. It was directed by Burt Gillett and produced by Walt Disney. It was the 55th Mickey Mouse short film, and the fifth of that year. 1991 the walt disney company. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Short movies
title: Ye Olden Days
